relation: Port and reenable the Snippets plugin.
Add KIOSlave to allow reading Perldoc documentation.
wrap all windows belonging to one project into one MDI window
Port code generation wizard to QWizard and replace all q3 widgets
Move the kate-ctags plugin to kdesdk.
